job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Computer Software,Consumer Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: At Uber we ignite opportunity by setting the world in motion We take on big problems to help drivers riders delivery partners and eaters get moving in more than 10000 cities around the worldltbrgtltbrgtWe welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to help build a future where everyone and everything can move independently If you have the curiosity passion and collaborative spirit work with us and lets move the world forward togetherltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat The Candidate Will Need  Bonus PointsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWhat the Candidate Will product managers data science and other stakeholders to gather requirementsltligtltligtPartner with fellow engineers to architect develop and scale observability tooling while keeping operational issues in mindltligtltligtMentor and support your fellow teammatesltligtltligtDrive ongoing efficiency and reliability improvements that improve the quality of the systemsltligtltligtWrite clear documentation so that other engineers can partner to contribute and deliverltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtBasic QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors degree or equivalent in the following areasltligtltligtProgramming language eg C C Java Python or GoltligtltligtNote the 1year total of specialized software engineering experience may have been gained through education and fulltime work experience additional training coursework research or similar OR some combination of these The year of specialized experience is not necessarily in addition to the years of Education
